text: Olabiyi Durojaiye (8 February 1933 â€“ 24 August 2021) was a Nigerian politician. He was a member of the Senate of Nigeria for the Ogun East constituency of Ogun State from 1999 until 2003. Durojaiye died on 24 August 2021 from COVID-19, aged 88.Breaking: Elder statesman Senator Olabiyi Durojaiye dies of COVID-19 ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Nigerian politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Lagos Category:People from Ogun State
title: Olabiyi Durojaiye
